title: Turkey Mike and a Hall of No Fame
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Turkey Mike and a Hall of No Fame
posts.post_content:
Offered today is an SGC 30 Old Mill Southern Leagues card of Tom Guiheen that you can be proud to own for $OLD shipped.  A proud new owner has stepped to the plate.;)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10253/guiheen-omsl[/IMG]

But that's not all.  How about an SGC 35 card of the toughest "Turkey Mike" Donlin card fielding with an SC 150 reverse for $44 shipped.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/37439/donlin-fielding[/IMG]

Not done yet.  How would like a mundane SGC 40 card of Baltimore's own Bob "Fameless" Hall for $42 shipped.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10254/hall[/IMG]

If you want to splurge and save a few bucks, buy Them both for $74 shipped.:eek::D
Are you looking to trade up to a Wagner?

[quote name="Peter_Spaeth" post=1675363]Are you looking to trade up to a Wagner?[/QUOTE]

i am sure he is... Heinie Wagner, bat over LEFT shoulder variation.
Frank always has something up his sleeve!

What About Bob?

Hall that is

Donlin too.

I will strongly consider the first four offers for this pair and likely will accept the best offer.

Be independent and make an offer.
